meanings.definition: To take an excessive or dangerous amount of a substance, especially a drug.
meanings.sent1: She was overdosing on medication and needed help.
meanings.sent2: He overdosed on painkillers and had to go to the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept overdosing on catnip and acting silly.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chocolate was so strong, it felt like overdosing on sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overdosing on those pills were severe.

meanings.definition: To administer an excessive or dangerous amount of a substance, especially a drug.
meanings.sent1: The nurse accidentally overdosed the patient with medication.
meanings.sent2: The drug dealer was arrested for overdosing his clients.
meanings.sent3: The chef jokingly accused the salt shaker of overdosing the soup.
meanings.sent4: The speaker overdosed the audience with too much information.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overdosing a patient can be life-threatening.
